column2: Time to finally wipe off the pimple of Iberia!
With Moravia back under our control we are now in a position to get the rest Czechia back in our hands
To consolidate our southern border we need to dissolve the local principalities and absorb it into the Hungarian Crown
To secure our coal and iron demand we must integrate silesia as a dejure part of the Commonwealth.
We shall create the Big Burgundy!
Our glory shall be revealed to the whole world!
After siezing our righteous titles we may now form a grand empire!
We are now ready to integrate those that are apart of a dead culture with dead ideals
With the collapse of the Dual Monarchy we are finally free, however we are still surrounded by potential enemies and we are going to need to raise money for the final defense of Ireland.

As a result of the collapsing monarchy many local seperatist movements gained popularity. In order to secure our internal stability we must make deals with local community members to gain their support.
With the downfall of the failed state of Burgundy we can claim a new righteous identity of Greater France!
After 20 years of securing our independance it is time to embrace our Jewish Identity
After taking over Western Aragonese Maghreb, and annexing the local natives we have gained total dominion over North-West Africa.
While our rule over Mexico was not loved, they will learn to love it
After the creation of a Jewish state in the Middle east many are fleeing to there
The flames of the Anglois Revolution have ignited Burgundy

After our conquest of the isles we have avenged our ancestors before us. The idea of a United Kingdom from the isles is no more. The question over who shall we attempt to integrate into our empire first remains.
We have managed to bring England into our core empire
We have managed to bring Ireland into our core empire
We are Overlords of both England and Ireland!
What shall we do with the Isles?
The Dual Monarchy has been dissolved. The new countries of Ireland, England, and France as well as the return of the Valois in Southern France Europe is in a chaotic situation
We need to start up building ports so we can have a coastal fleet
We need to have a strong navy to compete with others
The Sephardic minority shall no longer be seperate and excluded from our nation, but rather accepted.
Enables and disables the global flag to turn on and off the cb.
China and India get nerfs to their large population to help with balance & late-game lag.
Damn the acts of attempting to balance Asia.

Lets you pass any reform without the support of the upper house and gives the reform passed modifier for several years. You must still meet other requirements listed in the reform, e.g. you must have medicine in order to enact trinket healthcare and it cannot be less than 6 months since you passed another reform. The passed modifier gives negative tax efficiency and increased militancy.
By decreasing our trade tarrifs, we will encourage job development within our nation
Stop being an International Tax Haven
The cost of foreign corporations have proved to be too much

The Chinese colonists founded the Dong Guo federation long time ago and since then it has developed into a full-fledged country. But somehow they stand in way of establishing total control over the Pacific. We should focus our efforts southward.
German Nationalists have seized control of our neighbor and are now attempting to unify with us!
The Great Powers of Europe have all had their influence removed as a result of new nationalist agitation as Germany plunges into chaos
Tired of rule from Prague, Anvers, and Copenhagen, many German states have been taken over by nationalists who seek to unify Germany
German Nationalists have seized control of our neighbor and are now attempting to unify with us!
This event converts all non-core/non-accepted craftsmen into farmers if they are on your cores. Part 2 will spawn in 3 days, be sure to select this option FIRST.
This event converts all 100% unemployed farmers into laborers.
Though the deaths of many will be unfortunate, luckily that is §Ra price that we are willing to take §!§ if it means the survival of our nation.
Through our extreme measures numerous nations are now upset with us and our people are horiffied. Worst of all many seek seek revenge.
Tired of rule from Prague, Anvers, and Copenhagen, many German states have been taken over by nationalists who seek to unify Germany
Italian Nationalists have seized control of our neighbor and are now attempting to unify with us!
The Great Powers of Europe have all had their influence removed as a result of new nationalist agitation as Italy plunges into chaos
German Nationalists have seized control of our neighbor and are now attempting to unify with us!

Nationalists inspired from liberal ideas have thrown Italy into chaos through sweeping revolutions. This has given us the perfect opportunity to claim ourselves as the leaders of italy and to cut down our enemies if we see ourselves strong enough.
The Council of Europe must be restored!

Nationalists inspired from liberal ideas have thrown Italy into chaos through sweeping revolutions. This has given us the perfect opportunity to claim ourselves as the leaders of italy and to cut down our enemies if we see ourselves strong enough.
The Council of Europe must be restored!
The fate of our nation leaves many concerned
According to our peace treaty with $FROMCOUNTRY$, we must dismantle our factories and cancel all constructions and recruitments in the affected states.

Dismantle factories and cancel all constructions and recruitments in AI.\n\n§YNOTE: §RBecause of coding limitations this CB only works with one country at a time, if you are going to add it for more than one country then make sure to peace out separately.§W
Dismantle factories and cancel all constructions and recruitments in AI $STATE$
column4: Reißt Forts und Marinestützpunkte in $STATE$ ab

column2: Hungary would make a much more natural choice of an ally than the Ottoman Empire, it would weaken the geo strategic situation of our enemies.
Treaty of Friendship with the Ottoman Empire
The Ottoman Empire is still a strong nation despite its setbacks and would be a powerful ally.
Diplomats from $FROMCOUNTRY$ seek to establish a military alliance
A great day for the nation
Diplomats from Budapest have accepted our proposal of an alliance!
Diplomats from Budapest have declined our proposal of an alliance!

A great day for the nation
Diplomats from Constantinople have accepted our proposal of an alliance!
Diplomats from Constantinople have declined our proposal of an alliance!

Kicks every Player not in an alliance with the host nation!
Gives you acces to all unsiege decisions
SELECT the Nations to be unsieged!
unally the player you want to unsiege and then press this decision, if you aoutomatically re-allied him it worked and the flag is set!
If you pres this decision every player nation with the unsiege flag gets automatically fully unsieged

Throughout Burgundian history, Dutch merchants have brought back great wealth and enriched our homeland with untold treasures. It has come clear we will need to come back to our roots in trade if we wish to be a wealthy power.
The French identity has suffered from centuries of bastardization by the illegitimate Angloid tyrants. We must tolerate this no further by claiming ourselves as the true heirs to the Franks!

Our country needs a strong executive leader, so it's probably best we suspend our democratic institutions for just a little while...
Our country has recently had a coup, we must secure our authority.
We are now ready to start the process of consolidating the Empire
With the recent breakthroughs in engines and heating, we should be able to dramatically increase the livability of our cities with just a modest investment.
Toggle ON Dual Monarchy Reclaimation Decisions Visibility
Shows our decisions for our eventual return to the throne \n\n§R Forming Arcadia and Returning to the Dual Monarchy is mutually exclusive!
Toggle OFF Dual Monarchy Reclaimation Decisions Visibility
Hides our decisions for our eventual return to the throne \n\n§R Forming Arcadia and Returning to the Dual Monarchy is mutually exclusive!
Now that we have a significant foothold over our former territories, the people are beginning to see our rule as legitimate.
With our foothold in England, it should be no problem to reclaim the rest
With our foothold in France, it should be mostly no problem to reclaim the rest
Although not permanent, it is advisable that we move our capital to London for help in the liberation of England
Although not permanent, it is advisable that we move our capital to Paris for help in the liberation of France
At last, we have reestablished our rightful rule over the Dual Monarchy\n\n§R Forming Arcadia and Returning to the Dual Monarchy is mutually exclusive!
It is necessary that we make some concessions to Burgundy if we want to secure our rule once more, at least for right now.
Restore our French Claims to Burgundy
Now that we are back on the throne, we can now reassert our claims to our dejure French land
Now that we have our independence, they have no right to our land!
To be quite honest, the opinions and ambitions of some in Glascow mean nothing to us. That land is ours by right and we have to bring it back under our control, before our claim is lost forever
Through skillful diplomatic maneuvering and a brief war, we shall once again strengthen our dynastic claim in Italy

Our treasury is full of abundance, we need to find alternative ways to spend our money.


§RIf our treasury drops below 50k we will stop funding our projects!
We don't need to waste our money on fruitless government efforts
The societal order is under trememdous pressure from revolutionary forces. Our law enforcement agencies need expanded budgets to deal with these criminals.
Our population grows weary of the war as more and more soldiers return home wounded and disfigured. We must expand our benefits to support these soldier families.
We need to produce more! More farms and mines!
We need to invest in minimizing costs in order to secure an efficient economy
We need more production to secure a competitive economy
Our interconnected world demands that we must be quick to establish alliances, secure allies, and push our influence
A one time investment into our navy will do wonders to our shipbuilding capacity
Takes a state for your puppet
The Bretons are having their culture destroyed by the French, we must be their protector
